oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Compiled by Sayyid Ahmad from The light of prophecy, The wonders of heaven, The exposition of eschatology, The revival of religious sciences and from the Digest of Imam Ghazali" (colophon, f. 100r).
Writen in one column, 17 lines per page, in black and red.
MS Indo 19. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In Malay in the Jawi-Arabic script.
